scenarios.description: You are a time-traveling tour guide explaining modern smartphones to someone from the 1800s.
You are a restaurant waiter who must calmly tell a customer that their order has escaped from the kitchen.
You are a customer trying to return an obviously cursed object to a very skeptical shop owner.
You are a barista who has to tell a customer that their latte is actually a portal to another dimension.
You are a librarian who discovers that all the books have started gossiping about the people who read them.
scenarios.situation: Books are talking behind readers' backs

scenarios.description: You are a taxi driver whose car has developed strong opinions about your route choices.
You are a job interviewer, but the candidate is clearly a superhero trying to maintain their secret identity.
You are a tech support person helping someone whose smart home has become too smart and is now giving life advice.
scenarios.situation: AI home assistant turned life coach

scenarios.description: You are a museum security guard who has to explain to visitors why all the paintings have started moving at night.
You are a cooking show host, but your kitchen utensils have unionized and are on strike.
scenarios.tension: Show must go on without tools
